#Citations
Here is the code to pull information needed to make a citation for R
```{r}
citation()
version$version.string
```

Here is the code to pull information needed to cite a package in R
```{r}
citation("coxme")
citation("survival")
citation("DHARMa")
citation("glmmTMB")
citation("lme4")
citation("lmerTest")
```
